001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa;
002
003import com.google.common.eventbus.Subscribe;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.*;
006import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
007import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
008import org.junit.jupiter.api.io.TempDir;
009import org.mockito.ArgumentCaptor;
010
011import java.io.File;
012import java.io.IOException;
013
014import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
015import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.any;
016import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.contains;
017import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
018import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
019import static org.mockito.Mockito.verify;
020
021public class GradeBookFileManagerTest extends EventBusTestCase {
022
023  @Override
024  @BeforeEach
025  public void setUp() {
026    super.setUp();
027    new GradeBookFileManager(this.bus);
028  }
029
030  @Test
031  public void gradeBookLoadedOnLoadGradeBookEvent(@TempDir File tempDir) throws IOException {
032    String gradeBookName = "Test Grade Book";
033    File file = writeGradeBookToFile(tempDir, gradeBookName);
034
035    GradeBookLoadedHandler handler = mock(GradeBookLoadedHandler.class);
036    this.bus.register(handler);
037
038    this.bus.post(new LoadGradeBook(file));
039
040    ArgumentCaptor<GradeBookLoaded> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(GradeBookLoaded.class);
041    verify(handler).handle(event.capture());
042
043    assertThat(event.getValue().getGradeBook().getClassName(), equalTo(gradeBookName));
044  }
045
046  protected File writeGradeBookToFile(File tempDir, String gradeBookName) throws IOException {
047    File file = new File(tempDir, "testGradeBook.xml");
048
049    GradeBook book = new GradeBook(gradeBookName);
050    XmlDumper dumper = new XmlDumper(file);
051    dumper.dump(book);
052
053    return file;
054  }
055
056  private interface GradeBookLoadedHandler {
057    @Subscribe
058    void handle(GradeBookLoaded event);
059  }
060
061  @Test
062  public void unhandledExceptionEventPublishedWhenLoadingBadGradeBook(@TempDir File tempDir) throws IOException {
063    File badFile = new File(tempDir, "badGradeBook.xml");
064
065    UnhandledExceptionEventHandler handler = mock(UnhandledExceptionEventHandler.class);
066    this.bus.register(handler);
067
068    this.unhandledExceptionHandler = this::doNotFailTestWhenUnhandledExceptionEncountered;
069
070    this.bus.post(new LoadGradeBook(badFile));
071
072    ArgumentCaptor<UnhandledExceptionEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(UnhandledExceptionEvent.class);
073    verify(handler).handle(event.capture());
074
075    assertThat(event.getValue().getUnhandledException(), any(Throwable.class));
076  }
077
078  private interface UnhandledExceptionEventHandler {
079    @Subscribe
080    void handle(UnhandledExceptionEvent event);
081  }
082
083  @Test
084  public void gradeBookSavedToFileOnSaveGradeBookEvent(@TempDir File tempDir) throws IOException, ParserException {
085    String gradeBookName = "Test Grade Book";
086    File file = writeGradeBookToFile(tempDir, gradeBookName);
087
088    GradeBookLoadedHandler handler = mock(GradeBookLoadedHandler.class);
089    this.bus.register(handler);
090
091    this.bus.post(new LoadGradeBook(file));
092
093    ArgumentCaptor<GradeBookLoaded> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(GradeBookLoaded.class);
094    verify(handler).handle(event.capture());
095
096    GradeBook book = event.getValue().getGradeBook();
097    Assignment poa = new Assignment("poa", 1.0);
098    book.addAssignment(poa);
099
100    this.bus.post(new SaveGradeBook(book));
101
102    book = readGradeBookFromFile(file);
103    assertThat(book.getAssignmentNames(), contains(poa.getName()));
104  }
105
106  private GradeBook readGradeBookFromFile(File file) throws IOException, ParserException {
107    XmlGradeBookParser parser = new XmlGradeBookParser(file);
108    return parser.parse();
109  }
110
111}
